parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new collection. The name can be a maximum of 128 UTF8 characters, with no spaces.

parameters.name: disregard
parameters.description: Disregard this parameter. In order for the swagger spec to work, there needs to be at least one file in a multipart/form-data call. Uploading a file using this parameter has no impact on the collection.
